import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-ayuda', templateUrl: './ayuda.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ayuda.component.css'] }) export class AyudaComponent { constructor(private router:Router){} mostrarCartelAyuda = (this.router.url == "/ayuda") ? true : false }
